knowledge_panel.description: shenmue is an action-adventure game series created, produced and directed by yu suzuki. shenmue and shenmue ii were developed by sega am2 and published by sega for dreamcast. shenmue iii, developed by suzuki's company ys net, was released for playstation 4 and windows in 2019. wikipedia
